attributes.action: reconsider the vote taken in the House of Commons on 5th March 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before ratifying the Treaty of Europe which so closely resembles a constitution,the Government should pause and give the public full information about the IMPLICATIONS of the current treaty,using simple language.There should be time for representations to be made to local MPs before a FREE vote is called in the Commons,after wide ranging and well attended debate. The voting on 5th March has not been seen to represent the views of the people of this country.
